## CardaNostraAdaSpinner.delay property

Get Animation Delay.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get delay(): number;

set delay(value: number);
```

## Example


```ts
let spinner = new CardaNostraAdaSpinner({id="element-id", delay:0.5});
const spinnerDelay = spinner.delay;
// 0.5
```
